title: Building a Serverless Meme Generator With Nitric and OpenAI
author: Ryan Cartwright
description: A step-by-step guide, including what qualifies a cloud-based feature as truly serverless and how it differs from being merely cloud based or cloud native.
cntitle: 使用 Nitric 和 OpenAI 构建一个 Serverless Meme 生成器
cndescription: 一份逐步指南，包括什么使基于云的功能真正符合无服务器的标准，以及它与仅仅是基于云或云原生的区别。
